name: To Croak Or Not To Croak
name_original: To Croak Or Not To Croak
description:
A friend sends young witch Griseldis a present: a potion to transform someone into a frog. When the millers son shows her no respect she uses it to teach him a lesson.
Now she wants to reverse the effect. But how?

This is a short point & click adventure I made in two weeks for the AdvJam 2019. After the jam I squashed some bugs and did a little polishing.

Credits:
Engine: Visionaire Studio 5
Sound: sonniss.com free GDC-Bundle, freesound.org
Music: "Monkeys Spinning Monkeys"  and "Aquarium" by Kevin MacLeod, incompetech.filmmusic.io, CC by 4.0

Controls:
leftclick: pick up, use, talk
rightclick: look at
inventory at the bottom of the screen

Languages:
English and German - both text only
